jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work with multiple stakeholders in the organization to gather and analyze data
  • Provide analytical and strategical support for company's current product offerings and new products opportunities
  • Responsible on delivery of periodic consolidation reporting to both internal and external parties
  • Assist in coordination of internal multi-projects such as company's budgeting, business and operational improvement, etc
  • Support strategic initiatives such as historical performance analysis, market projections, market research, etc

• Min. 4 years of work experience
  • Graduated from a reputable university with a strong academic background
  • Finance, Accounting, Statistics or Engineering background preferred, with a strong interest in business and management
  • Self-driven and collaborative team player, with ability to work effectively with people at all levels in an organization
  • Good time-management skills, with ability to meet tight deadlines and handle simultaneous work streams
  • Good communication and interpersonal skills
  • Fluent in spoken and written English
